text_bubbles.text: converts all Sinflame into Purging Flame

can be used after casting any skill
deals fixed damage
can trigger a dodge while sliding
does not reset attack cycles for short time
prevents the generation of Sinflame and Afterflame
DMG multiplied by 1.015x per stack, up to 1.6x
Party Member casting an Echo Skill
generates 8 Afterflame on cast, once per name (requires five to max)
empowers specific attacks with ATK +85% for 14 seconds
inflicts 1 stack of Fated End on hit
each attack name can only generate 1 stack per 5 seconds
Multiplies DMG taken from Galbrena by 1.05x per stack, up to 1.2x
Crit DMG +2% per stack for specific attacks, up to +80%
Party gains All-Attribute DMG Bonus +20% for 20 seconds
Fusion DMG multiplied by 1.0875x per stack, up to 1.35x
